ActivationPlatform.name: ActivationPlatform
ActivationPlatform.description: Represents metadata about ActivationPlatform, such as platform name, delivery schedule, output format, and destination folder. This object is available in API version 54.0 and later.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name for the ActivationPlatform object.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether this Activation Platform is enabled (true) or not (false).

FullName.description: The full name of the associated ActivationPlatform in Metadata API. The full name can include a namespace prefix.

IncludeSegmentNames.description: Indicates whether to include the segment name in the metadata (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The language of the ActivationPlatform. The value for this field is the language value of the org.

LogoUrl.description: Logo for the activation channel destination.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: Label for the ActivationPlatform. In the UI, this field is ActivationPlatform.

Metadata.description: Provides access to the associated type.

OutputFormat.description: The output format of the file.

PeriodicRefreshFrequecy.description: The full refresh frequency in days for incremental refresh mode. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

RefreshFrequency.description: Indicates how often the activation platform accepts data delivery in hours.

RefreshMode.description: The mode of refreshing the file.
